Reviews.Title: Love the Camera, Dislike the Added Extras
Reviews.Author: M. Hollins "milliepat"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to order only the camera and the lens, but Amazon was out of stock for two months for Prime orders.  This was an Xmas gift from husband, and we got it from Cameta Camera at a good price.  I did return for store credit the Card and the Backpack.  I rated the Camera plus Lens as five star all around, but since this review is about the whole package, I dropped off one Star because the Backpack does not fit the Camera and this Lens comfortably.  It is a good looking bag but just not the right size for a large camera and long lens.  Cameta in my opinion would better serve its customers by upgrading the Backpack and removing all the other extras.  I am still searching for a good backpack.  Right now using the Case Logic messenger camera bag sold on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Whole Package is Great - Two Items Not That Good
Reviews.Author: Georges Rehbane
Reviews.Content: The whole package is great for me. I'm new to photography so I can't provide a decent review on the camera or the lens. However, two things I dislike are: 1- the LCD screen protector is not practical. It didn't last one day on the LCD screen and 2- The memory card bundled in this package is not among Nikon's certified list. I got it working for an hour before it stopped working. The reseller offered me a replacement card but I guess I'll ask to pay the difference and get a SanDisk as it is among the certified Nikon memory cards.

Reviews.Title: Budding photographer
Reviews.Author: Denise Vyse
Reviews.Content: The Mr. thinks he's a professional now. Bundle came with everything described. Everything works and is exactly what we expected. The backpack has many protective inserts that easily remove to allow you to adjust everything to your preferences. Going to Italy for two weeks in October - hoping to take thousands of great pics!!!

KIT INCLUDES 11 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Nikon 18-200mm VR II AF-S Lens +
<3> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <4> Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <5> Vivitar 72mm UV Glass Filter +
<6> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <7> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<9> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <10> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <11> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body with 18-200mm VR Lens + 32GB Card + Backpack + Battery + Filter + Accessory Kit
